text:
KB5034441: Windows Recovery Environment update for Windows 10, version 21H2 and
22H2: January 9, 2024 - Microsoft Support
 
"This update requires 250 MB of free space in the recovery partition to install
successfully. " 
I have 300 MB free and it's still failing.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft

successfully. " 
I have 300 MB free and it's still failing.
